content.raw:
We had a brief discussion with Erwin today about rope physics in bullet. To reduce the stretchiness of the ropes, we should [increase the piterations parameter](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/master/Demos/SoftDemo/SoftDemo.cpp#L480).

Also, Erwin mentioned that only the nodes of the rope will collide (by default). If we want more collisions, then we should add additional collision shapes to the ropes.
